definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: He got a whole sackful of letters from listeners following the show.
sentences.chinese: 演出後他收到大量的聽衆來信。

sentences.english: If my little bit wrong incoming letter word disease sentence invites help correct that.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的來信有一些錯詞病句請幫忙糾正。

sentences.english: If it's a letter from Mary, read it out, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 媽，如果是瑪麗的來信，就大聲念念吧。

sentences.english: Whenever you need money, send me words three weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 無論何時假如你需要錢，請於三星期前來信關照。

sentences.english: In the front of the shaoxing work received the letter, sister szabics with myriad heart.
sentences.chinese: 在前方的紹功收到了妹妹紹英的來信，心中慨嘆萬千。

sentences.english: We have noted your letter of August 5 under the above caption .
sentences.chinese: 我們注意到你方上述標題下的八月五日來信。

sentences.english: She pored her eyes out over his letters.
sentences.chinese: 她因看了他的好多封來信，把眼睛都看花了。

sentences.english: Several days ago, I received a letter from him.
sentences.chinese: 幾天前我收到了一封他的來信。

sentences.english: Several people reminisced about the deaths of their own childhood pets.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在他們的來信中回憶自己童年時寵物的離世。

sentences.english: We were all delighted to receive your letter.
sentences.chinese: 我們都很高興收到你的來信。

sentences.english: I will end here and hope to hear from you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我要就此擱筆了，盼望早日收到你的來信。

sentences.english: Soft beg opportunely her again, and so on, striking must be letters.
sentences.chinese: 巧柔求她再等等，韻書一定會來信的。

sentences.english: Letters have been coming in from everybody who heard the news on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 收聽到這一新聞的人都紛紛來信。

sentences.english: We take great interest in your letter.
sentences.chinese: 我對您的來信頗感興趣。

sentences.english: I received a letter from her in her neat script .
sentences.chinese: 我收到她的字體很勻整的來信。

sentences.english: Wang Hong got(had, received)a letter from his parents just now.
sentences.chinese: 王紅剛纔收到了父母的來信。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
